name: Card Binder: MTG Manager
description:
Quickly scan and save all your cards into your Binder collection, check each card price in real-time. You will be able to see a lot of details for each card: legality, all the card editions, first appearance date, and more!

Features:
- Build your collection quickly scanning all your cards.
- Explore card details including the legality, price, editions, and much more.
- Build amazing decks with support for sideboard and maybeboard.
- All content is live and automatically updated.
- Collection stored and shared between all your IOS devices.
- Search for any card, even if it is not in your collection.
- Get to know more cards using the explore tab. It will show random cards to you.
- No adds, forever.
- Dark mode support.
- Export and share your collection using .csv files.

If you have any question or feedback we'd love to hear from you at info@nicoyuste.es
